item.title: All-Grain Brew Day Guide
item.description: Introduction All-grain brewingBrewing using grains as the main ingredient, rather than extract. seems intimidating, but actually isn’t as complex as one would think. Personally, I struggle with extract and never seem to get it all out of the container, so all-grain brewingBrewing using grains as the main ingredient, rather than extract. agrees with me. The only additional equipment you need to go from extract brewingBrewing using malt extract syrup to all-grain brewingBrewing using grains as the main ingredient, rather than extract.

item.title: Pilsner Brew Day - July 2019
item.description: Today is brew day, and I will be cooking the Brewer’s Pantry ‘Pilsners’ kit. This is my first attempt at an all-grain brewBrewing using grains as the main ingredient, rather than extract. , and the only additional equipment that I had to purchase was the mash tunLarge insulated container used for steeping grains in hot water (see mash). and some 1⁄2 inch tubing!
